item.content:encoded:
Purple Clover | St Patrick’s Day Irish Blessing Card

Best Deals! Purple Clover | St Patrick’s Day Irish Blessing Card – St Patricks Day Cards Popular Purple Clover It’s a great choice St Patrick’s Day Irish Blessing Card It’s in stock and ready to ship.This St Patrick’s Day card features the Irish Blessing surrounded by a border of purple clover. On the right side is the Irish Blessing “May the road rise up to meet you. May the wind always be at your back. May the sun shine warm upon your face, and rains fall soft upon your fields. And until we meet again, May God hold you in the palm of His hand.” On the inside of the card is an all over pattern of clover that coordinates with the front. Price:$4.17
